original_text: Wherefore I have not sinned against thee, but thou doest me wrong to war against me: the Lord the Judge be judge this day between the children of Israel and the children of Ammon.
korean_text: 내가 네게 죄를 짓지 아니하였거늘 네가 나를 쳐서 내게 악을 행하고자 하는도다 원하건대 심판하시는 여호와께서 오늘 이스라엘 자손과 암몬 자손 사이에 판결하시옵소서 하였으나

sentences.original_text: Wherefore I have not sinned against thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 나는 너에게 죄를 짓지 않았으나

sentences.original_text: but thou doest me wrong to war against me
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나에게 잘못하여 나와 싸우고 있도다

sentences.original_text: the Lord the Judge be judge
this day between the children of Israel
